snippet.title: Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
#ww2, #strategy, #wargame, #turnbased #tactics #fightforfreedom #strategicmind 
Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1381850?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=trailer_gameplay&utm_medium=we

Strategic Mind: Fight for Freedom is a history-driven turn-based strategy set in WW2. Take command of the Allied forces and protect your homeland and the whole of Europe from totalitarian madness. Form armies. Win battles. Change history.

The game has 2 campaigns: British one features fully historical battles, while the US one has historical operations up to the defeat of Germany and also features a number of alternate history battles against the USSR afterward. It is created with great care and attention to historical details by a team which is passionate about WW2 history.

Released: 21 May 2021.

| Games by Starni Games |
- Strategic Mind: Spectre of Communism
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1341170/Strategic_Mind_Spectre_of_Communism/
- Strategic MInd: Blitzkrieg
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1200330/Strategic_Mind_Blitzkrieg/
- Strategic Mind: The Pacific
https://store.steampowered.com/app/991810/Strategic_Mind_The_Pacific/
- Panzer Strategy
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769950/Panzer_Strategy/

| Strategic Mind Franchise Soundtrack |
Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1358280/Strategic_Mind_Franchise_Soundtrack/?curator_clanid=35230293
Listen to four free tracks: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IRLx8kM6vEY&list=PLnfx9IlBrrg0TBvlUbcc_ba1WRpFTcS7L

| Follow Starni Games |
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StarniGames
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/PlayStrategicMind/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuanlWlol8gved2OQ0zsZvw

| StarniGames Website | 
http://starnigames.com/

Music: GoodIdeaProduction
AdRev
